text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section: "Central services" means the performance of central management or administrative functions.

text.section: "Company headquarters" means a facility where the majority of a business entity's financial, personnel, legal, and planning functions are handled on a regional or national basis.
"Full-time position" means a position requiring an employee to work at least 840 hours during at least 24 weeks in a 6-month period.
"Qualified employee" means an employee filling a qualified position.
